title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.31 - Restricted vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.31 - Restricted vehicles

State Regulations

The following type vehicles, including those elsewhere
defined in this Part, are not permitted on the parkways within the parkway
system, unless authorized under an agreement with the department: (a) bicycles; (b) buses; (c) commercial; (d) golf carts; (e) hearses, except those operated by or for
a licensed funeral director or undertaker while traveling to or from a funeral, interment, cremation, place of death or other destination for the acceptance
and shipment of the body or remains of a deceased person; (f) house coaches; (g) motor-driven cycles; (h) school buses; (i) semitrailers; (j) snowmobiles; (k) tractors; (l) trailers; (m) trucks, except emergency service or
towing vehicles operated in compliance with section
182.37
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.31

Amended

New

York State Register February 14, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 7, eff. 2/14/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
